docs.snippet: Green Party supporters rallied in freezing temperatures in Michigan's capital on Thursday and urged its high court to revive a recount of presidential votes in one of three states where the party wants ballots re-examined....
docs.lead_paragraph: Green Party supporters rallied in freezing temperatures in Michigan's capital on Thursday and urged its high court to revive a recount of presidential votes in one of three states where the party wants ballots re-examined.

headline.main: Greens Rally in Michigan as Courts in Three States Weigh Recounts
headline.print_headline: Greens Rally in Michigan as Courts in Three States Weigh Recounts

docs.snippet: A federal judge's ruling that effectively halted Michigan's presidential recount after three days assured Republican Donald Trump's narrow victory in the state....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge's ruling that effectively halted Michigan's presidential recount after three days assured Republican Donald Trump's narrow victory in the state.

headline.main: Michigan Recount Over; Pennsylvania Sets Hearing
headline.print_headline: Michigan Recount Over; Pennsylvania Sets Hearing

docs.snippet: Sen. Harry Reid bid farewell to the Senate Thursday after 30 years in the chamber and more than a decade as top Democrat, a remarkable run during which he shepherded key Obama administration legislation including the sweeping health care law....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sen. Harry Reid bid farewell to the Senate Thursday after 30 years in the chamber and more than a decade as top Democrat, a remarkable run during which he shepherded key Obama administration legislation including the sweeping health care law.

headline.main: Harry Reid Bids Farewell to Senate After 30 Years
headline.print_headline: Harry Reid Bids Farewell to Senate After 30 Years

docs.snippet: A Republican congressman from northern Wisconsin who derided Madison as a communist haven is not backing down from his comments even as those in the capital city that prides itself as being "77 square miles surrounded by reality" take offense....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Republican congressman from northern Wisconsin who derided Madison as a communist haven is not backing down from his comments even as those in the capital city that prides itself as being "77 square miles surrounded by reality" take offense.

headline.main: Communist Madison? City Bristles at Congressman's Remark
headline.print_headline: Communist Madison? City Bristles at Congressman's Remark

docs.snippet: In this lesson we explore America’s unique system of “indirect popular election,” in which majority votes at the state level serve as a guide for a final vote of 538 members of the Electoral College....
docs.lead_paragraph: In this lesson we explore America’s unique system of “indirect popular election,” in which majority votes at the state level serve as a guide for a final vote of 538 members of the Electoral College.

headline.main: The Final Vote for President: Learning About the Electoral College
